Unimportant DBI methods

Source: R/dbi-table.R, R/dbi.R, R/driver-db2.R, and 3 more
DBI-methods.Rd

Unimportant DBI methods

Usage

# S4 method for class 'OdbcConnection'
sqlData(con, value, row.names = NA, ...)

# S4 method for class 'HDB'
sqlCreateTable(
  con,
  table,
  fields,
  row.names = NA,
  temporary = FALSE,
  ...,
  field.types = NULL
)

# S4 method for class 'Hive,character'
dbQuoteString(conn, x, ...)

# S4 method for class 'Teradata'
sqlCreateTable(
  con,
  table,
  fields,
  row.names = NA,
  temporary = FALSE,
  ...,
  field.types = NULL
)
